HVAC - R Coils

Salama Engineering Industries, based in Saudi Arabia, is best known for its wide range of HVAC coils. We offer design, manufacturing, installation and anti-corrosion coating services of coils for most of the HVAC and industrial operations. Our firm is focused on high quality of products and services, which allows carrying out effective customization of offered solutions for each customer individually in line with applicable standards. 

The competitive edge that we possess lies in unique pricing, exceptional customer service and innovative solutions. With over a decade of industry experience, you can count on Salama Engineering Industries to deliver high-quality products on time, regardless of the project sizes.

Discover the Best from SALAMA Engineering Today!

Explore Our Products

Products

Condenser Coils

We design and manufacture coils with different types of fins and tube materials with various thicknesses. Mostly copper, aluminum fins and pre coated aluminum fins are being used. Different types of refrigerants (Condenser and Evaporator coils), liquids (Chilled water / glycol coils and Hot water / glycol coils ), fluids ( Steam coils and air charge coils )

  • Copper Condenser Coils: Strong structure offers high heat exchanger effectiveness
  • Aluminum Condenser Coils: Highly portable yet good with heat dynamics
  • Pre-Coated Aluminum Coils: Avoids corrosion in extreme environments
  • Multi-Fluid Compatible Coils: Engineered for use with steam, water, and air applications.
Contact Sales
Inquire Now

Direct Expansion (DX) Coils

We design and manufacture Evaporator (Direct Expansion – DX) Coils for HVAC equipment. Singles, dual / quad compressor circuits are available. We can supply all types of rows as well as interlaced circuiting, which provides the highest precision in capacity control.

We design coils with special connectors, distributors, and framework designed to meet the customer requirements. Our unique interlaced circuiting options assure uniform refrigerant distribution over the entire face area of the coil. Wide fin spacing availability reduces the effect of frost build-up on low temperature applications. Standard or custom-built direct expansion cooling coils (evaporators) are manufactured for a wide variety of applications.

  • Single comprised Circuit DX Coils: preferred in compact setups.
  • Double Circuit DX Coils: offers more efficiency and capacity.
  • Quad Circuit DX Coils: the most preferable in cases of high productivity.
  • Custom DX Coils: bespoke designs aimed at unique specifications.
Contact Sales
Inquire Now

AHU Chilled Water Coils / FCU Coils

We design and manufacture AHU/FCU Coils for HVAC equipment. CHW and DX type of AHU/FCU coils can be manufactured. All our coils are designed as per AHRI- certified selection software. This ensures our customers receive optimum performance for size characteristics, helping to deliver cost effective solutions. With our wide ranges of fin patterns, tube sizes & patterns, coils can either be uniquely designed to maximize performance at minimal cost or designed as a direct replacement unit without affecting existing client designs. Air Handling Units (AHU), Fan Coil Units (FCU), Heat Recovery Systems (Run-around coils), Air-cooled Condensers / Air-cooled Chillers.

  • Standard DX Cooling Coils
  • Enhanced-Fin DX Coils
  • Double-Circuit DX Coils
  • Multi-Row DX Coils
  • Sub-Cooling DX Coils
  • Hot Gas Reheat DX Coils
  • Variable Air Volume (VAV) DX Coils
  • Dual Refrigerant DX Coils
  • Dehumidification DX Coils
  • Split-System DX Coils
Contact Sales
Inquire Now

Bend Coils

We design and manufacture bend type Coils for HVAC equipment with different types of fins and tube materials, and designs with various thickness.

Mostly copper, aluminum fins and pre coated aluminum fins are being used to assemble these coils based on their functions and applications.

  • U-Bend Coils: Ideal for compact spaces.
  • Spiral Bend Coils: Enhanced heat transfer.
  • Serpentine Coils: Suitable for complex configurations.
  • Helical Bend Coils: Optimized for uniform air distribution.
  • Dual Circuit Coils: For simultaneous heating and cooling.
  • Full Circle Coils: Best for 360-degree airflow applications.
Contact Sales
Inquire Now

Heat Pipes

Salama has the capability to design, manufacture and install the Heat pipes. Salama’s HRHPs are designed to be hassle-free with ‘plug and play’ technology. Heat pipes are passive devices without moving parts. The fins shall be of the rippled or louvered type to suit the application. Tubes shall be of refrigeration standard seamless copper and options for external fins shall be of aluminum and Copper.

  • HSHP (HORSESHOE HEAT PIPE)
  • HRHP (HEAT RECOVERY HEAT PIPE) Vertical & Horizontal Orientation
Contact Sales
Inquire Now

Services

Our HVAC-R Coils division specializes in professional installation, commissioning, and advanced anti-corrosion coatings for HVAC and refrigeration systems.

Installation

At Salama, our experts focus on HVAC retrofit projects. Changing coils on a variety of air conditioning systems and chillers is one of the projects that they undertake. A quality engineer is present at every stage to oversee the process so that the commissioning is exact to OEM requirements.

Coatings

We offer high-quality protective coatings for various coils like condensers and evaporators. Our available Hydrophilic and Blygold coatings suitable for the extreme climatic conditions of the Gulf region both on land and at sea. They enhance durability of the coils, offering optimal resistance to corrosion and deterioration.
